entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PropertyNamingPolicy is not applied to ExpandoObject/dynamic objects #62101
  • dump collection infra and python crypto dependency #62100
  • fill the mono_alc_get_ambient with right behavior #62099
  • [API Proposal]: Return implementation for IEnumerable<T> #62097
  • Regex Capture gives ArgumentOutOfRangeException (regression) and incorrect index (not regression) in lazy quantifier around zero lower bound quantifier that does not match #62094

Closed

  • Improved Logical Shift for BitArray Collection #46871
    Future
  • ```ImmutableList<T>.GetRange``` should accept a ```Range``` #48592
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix a few syntax issues in shell scripts #62102
  • Add path information to INotifyInstanceUserLimitExceeded #62096
    area-System.IO
  • Support unloadability in `DispatchProxy`. #62095
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Add parser tests from nim-regex #62093
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Update libunwind to v1.6.0 #62092
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Flip IL offset check #62049
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix miscellaneous typos #62062
    area-Meta, community-contribution

Updated

  • [Wasm] JS modularization #61313
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Expose Comment in ZipArchive and ZipArchiveEntry #59442
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • make System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates compliant with interop guidelines - part 4 #61986
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • PE loader/image investigations #61938
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Encapsulate the logic of caching the last synchronously completed task. #61781
    community-contribution
  • Delete `GT_SIMD_CHK` and `GT_HW_INTRINSIC_CHK` #62088
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] A draft of doc for describing debugger behavior. #62015
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • CI matrix change: add Windows.Server.Core.20H2 - Second attempt #60054
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • WIP: first group project for type generator tests 0-99 #61942
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
